title: Meet of Opposition CMs in Delhi soon, says MK Stalin; KCR to meet Uddhav Thackeray, Mamata Banerjee - India Today
content:
1. Meet of Opposition CMs in Delhi soon, says MK Stalin; KCR to meet Uddhav Thackeray, Mamata Banerjee  India Today
  2. "Misuse Of Power By Governors": Mamata Banerjee, MK Stalin Plan Meeting  NDTV
  3. DMK's Stalin hints at meeting of opposition CMs in New Delhi  Economic Times
  4. TN CM MK Stalin & Bengal's Mamata Declare War; Stalin Says Convention Of Opposition CMs Soon  India Today
  5. Amid Outreach To MK Stalin, KCR, Mamata Banerjee's Snub For Congress  NDTV
  6. View Full coverage on Google News
description: Tamil Nadu CM MK Stalin has said that a convention of Opposition CMs will soon be held in Delhi as part of an initiative by Mamata Banerjee. Meanwhile, the Telangana CM has also said that he would meet his West Bengal and Maharashtra counterparts soon.
